column7: The student participating in this elective will gain initial exposure to Orthopedic Sports Medicine both in the clinic setting and in the operating room. The student will work one-on-one with the faculty in the operating room and clinic in the care of orthopedic sports medicine patients. This elective can be tailored to the individual studentâ€™s needs, interest, and educational level. No graduate credit. 2 professional hours. Approved for S/U grading only.
